mean_cn: adj. 有趣的，引人入胜的
mean_en: attracting your attention and making you want to learn more about something or to be involved in something :not dull or boring
word_etyma: inter 表示“在…之间，相互” +est表示最高级“最.+ ing [形容词后缀]表示行为、状态、情况及其他   →interesting adj.有趣的，引人入胜的
sentence: Even though I don't like the singing, I think that their costumes are really interesting.
sentence_trans: 尽管我不喜欢这种音乐，但我认为他们的戏服是真的很有意思。
